history.title: Commitment to Venezuelan Hospitality
history.paragraph1: The Circuit of Excellence is a non-profit Civil Association that brings together a select group of inns in Venezuela. We were born with the firm purpose of raising service and hospitality standards in the country, offering travelers authentic experiences guaranteed by a rigorous management system.
history.paragraph2: Our network does not only represent accommodation; it represents a culture of quality that is lived in every corner of our associated inns, from the Andes to the Caribbean coasts.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: "To promote and strengthen excellence in hospitality in Venezuela, through a network of inns that operate under a quality management system, driving sustainable development and the appreciation of our culture."

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: "To be the national and international reference for high-quality Venezuelan hospitality, recognized for the warmth of service, the authenticity of our experiences, and the unwavering commitment to tourism excellence."

evolution.title: Quality Management Model

juniorAssociate.title: What is a Junior Associate?
juniorAssociate.description: A Junior Associate is an inn that has recently joined our Circuit. Currently, it is in the process of adapting to our Technical Standard. The Junior Associate status lasts approximately one year.

items.question: What is the Circuit of Excellence?
items.answer: It is an association of inns formed by a group of Venezuelan entrepreneurs and dreamers who, combining efforts, talent, and enthusiasm, decided to share their lifestyle to create and share a culture of hosts and quality. This association groups the best inns in the country.

items.question: How to book at a Circuit of Excellence inn?
items.answer: Contacting the inn of your choice directly.

items.question: How to become a member of the Circuit of Excellence?
items.answer: To be part of the Circuit of Excellence, you must contact those responsible to coordinate an introductory visit.
